description:
Kennedy, Kennedy, Robbins & Yarbro, LC, is a personal injury law firm located in Poplar Bluff, Missouri, which serves clients in the communities of Poplar Bluff, Qulin, Fisk, Neelyville, Doniphan, Van Buren, Ellington, Centerville, Winona, Eminence, Piedmont, Greenville, Dexter, Bloomfield, Advance, Fredericktown, Farmington, Campbell, Malden, Bernie, Kennett, Caruthersville, Cape Girardeau, Sikeston, Charleston, Salem, West Plains, New Madrid and Potosi.

For more than 30 years, the law firm’s personal injury attorneys have helped those who were injured due to the negligence of another, particularly in car accidents and due to medical malpractice. When you trust Kennedy, Kennedy, Robbins & Yarbro, LC, to handle your auto accident, medical negligence or work-related accident, you can rest assured that our lawyers have the experience, the good judgment and the caring attitude to help you through the difficult process of healing and getting on with your life.

Our personal injury trial lawyers routinely try cases in the courthouses of Bollinger, Butler, Cape Girardeau, Carter, Dent, Dunklin, Howell, Iron, Madison, Mississippi, New Madrid, Oregon, Pemiscot, Ripley, Reynolds, St. Francois, Scott, Shannon, Stoddard, Texas, Wayne and Washington, Missouri, counties.

Our car accident and medical malpractice attorneys work on a contingency fee basis, which means that you are not charged an attorney fee until there is a successful outcome received through settlement or trial. The law firm of Kennedy, Kennedy, Robbins & Yarbro, LC, does not charge attorney fees for an initial consultation regarding your car, motorcycle, truck or other motor vehicle accident or medical malpractice injury.
